section.6: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Ramadan

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abd Allah b. 'Amr: The Prophet (ï·º) as saying to him: Complete the recitation of the Qu'ran in one month. He said: I have more strength. He (the Prophet) said: Complete the recitation in twenty days. He again said: I have more energy. He said : Recite in fifteen days. He again said: I have more energy. He said: Recite in ten days. He again said: I have more energy. He said: Recite in seven days, do not add to it. Abu Dawud said: The tradition narrated by Muslim is more perfect
